content: The reason NYC trains get gummed up in Penn Station is because we, the citizens of the Republic, have elected to Congress a bunch of folks who prefer to spend half our tax money on oversees wars rather than keep the trains running smoothly at home.   Wars or infrastructure -- it's that simple.   The denial in the U.S. about spending priorities -- and subsequent results of those priorities -- has truly become a full-blown mental illness.  There is a relationship between spending billions of dollars dropping bombs around the world watching our utility and transportation infrastructures at home literally fall apart.
